TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PersistableIdleAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist. Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed. None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
